items.answer: We're open daily from 7:30am to 7:30pm. Last wash must start by 7:30pm to ensure machines finish before closing.
items.question: What are your hours?

items.answer: Drop off your laundry before noon for same-day service ($1.50/lb) or anytime for next-day service ($1.35/lb). We sort, wash, dry, and carefully fold your clothes. We'll text you when it's ready for pickup.
items.question: How does wash & fold work?

items.answer: Join free and collect 1 stamp for every 25lb of laundry. Earn exclusive Speed Drop Off service (curbside pickup), spin the wheel for prizes after 3 stamps, and get special member offers.
items.question: What is the Wash & Fold Club?

items.answer: Yes! Bring your garments in for a fitting and quote. Our experienced tailor handles hemming, resizing, and all types of alterations with quick turnaround.
items.question: Do you offer alterations?

map.title: Find Us
map.directions: We're located on North Street in Middletown, easily accessible from downtown. Free street parking and lot parking available.

form.title: Send Us a Message

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us how we can help you...

form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible
form.errorMessage: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try calling us directly at (845) 394-0158.
form.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Questions about our services, hours, or pricing? We're here to help.

hours.note: Last wash must start by 7:30pm to ensure completion before closing.
hours.title: Hours of Operation

emergency.title: Need Help?
emergency.message: Our team is here to assist with any laundry questions during business hours.

introduction.text: Contact WeWash for questions about self-service laundry, wash & fold service, alterations, or our loyalty programs.

contactMethods.title: Join Our Club
contactMethods.description: Earn stamps, get Speed Drop Off, win prizes
